item.title: Prerequisites
item.author: Author
item.description: There are a small number of tools you need in order to create and deploy Streamlit apps. Software Python Streamlit is a Python package, and requires Python 3.6+. To verify you have an appropriate version of Python, run: python --version from a command line. If you see a Python 2 version then try python3 --version instead. Tip If you are installing Python on Windows, make sure you tick the “add to path” option when presented.
